name: mri_deface
description: MRI Deface utility for removing facial features from MRI images.

inputs.name: Input Volume
inputs.description: The input volume to be defaced (e.g. anatomical MRI image).

inputs.name: Brain Template
inputs.description: Template volume of the brain to be used for defacing.

inputs.name: Face Template
inputs.description: Template volume of the face to be used for defacing.

inputs.name: Defaced Output Volume
inputs.description: The output volume path for the defaced image.

author: FreeSurfer Developers
